description: Source code for chat controller handling conversation and message management, including creating conversations, listing conversations and messages, and sending messages with AI-generated replies.

methods.name: createConversation
methods.description: Creates a new conversation in the database with provided title or default.

methods.name: listConversations
methods.description: Retrieves list of conversations ordered by creation date.

methods.name: listMessages
methods.description: Retrieves messages for a specific conversation.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Handles sending a message, creating conversation if needed, storing user message, generating AI reply, and storing assistant message.
